alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:22AM PST until March 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 2500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior and Southern Humboldt Interior Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
